Below are the different homework assignments for the course. Scan your homework as a PDF. You can use [CamScanner](https://www.camscanner.com/), [Dropbox](https://help.dropbox.com/create-upload/document-scanning), [Google Drive](https://support.google.com/drive/answer/3145835?hl=en&co=GENIE.Platform%3DAndroid), or [icloud](https://support.apple.com/en-us/108963). Any assignments as images or not pdfs will not be graded.
